title: attach resource metering tag expects to be a extremely lightweight job but not now
body:
## Bug Report

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29565014/148873541-cb2f1807-f470-4c6c-9bc0-6bdaaf1d8d79.png)


### What version of TiKV are you using?
master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
no matter

### Steps to reproduce
sysbench, pprof

### What did you expect?
attach < 0.3%

### What did happened?
attach > 3%
